overview: Martín Villanueva, a former governor, was publicly charged with the crime of laundering money to finance the presidential campaign of his party's candidate. Martín and his wife, protected by the candidate, hide in a house while the things calm down. But the paranoia of both by what happens abroad, begins to corner them more and more in the rooms, the doors are closing and they lose gradually your possessions.
tagline: There is nothing left to do
title: House Taken Over
